article:
For notification about needless repetition in Wikipedia articles, see
[[Template:Repetition]].

'Repetition' may refer to: *Repetition (rhetorical device), rhetorical device
*Repetition (music), use of repetition in musical compositions *Repetition
(learning), learning by repetition *[[Repetition (Kierkegaard)|Repetition]],
book by the Danish philosopher SÃ¸ren Kierkegaard published in 1843

*"Repetition", song by synth-pop band Information Society
